main.name: Mario Merino
main.description: During my free time i enjoy reading books and improving my skills feel free to look around!
main.bio: My name is Mario Merino.  I am a Web Developer by trade and an ok Mechanic/Photographer in my free time.  I was one of the first hires at a successful startup and learned their stack quickly and efficiently. I’m passionate about technology - not a specific framework or language. In this line of work, it's about adaptation, and what works best for the project. I’m open to learning any stack if it works.

education.description: Thorough education in the underlying theory, concepts, and science behind more complex programming. It was here that I discovered my passion for scalable application programming (web and mobile), the security behind computer and application systems, and found that I had a knack for web development

work.company: University of Texas Health Science Center
work.title: Web Developer III
work.description: Currently responsbile for planning and developing seo initiatives at UT Health including deployment of front end and back end developments to achieve our SER goals. I am also resposible for maintaining and updating UT Health websites as well as analyzing traffic with google analytics setting up tracking with tag manager and devoloping reports with google data studio

work.title: General Manager Web Developer
work.description: I was responsbile for marketing and maintaining current APO website. Currently developing an E-Commerce site, that will allow our b2b customers to select body part items from a specific store inventory and see item details such as QTY,COST,CERTIFICATION ETC...

work.title: Web Developer
work.description: Description: Designed Developed & Launched several websites using React as a preferred front end library would meet with customers either in person if local or via Skype in order to design and establish design & marketing goals for their website.Implemented SEO strategies and individual client website reporting regarding traffic trends,improper SEO strategies and missed opportunities with content,keywords,back-link gaps. Created or Redesigned several websites using a variety of Libraries,Languages,Frameworks.

work.title: Internal Service Manager
work.description: Managed Used and New Car Services at the dealership also tasked with implementing appropriate Negotiated cost for both parts and services within the dealer and with outside repair shops. Maintained high customer satisfaction for clients who just purchased a new or used car and had unforeseen repairs.
